definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: When several compounds are formed, there is the possibility of more than one peritectic point .
sentences.chinese: 当生成数种化合物时，就可能有一个以上的转熔点。

sentences.english: He says it will have a high melting point.
sentences.chinese: 他认为硅的熔点非常高。

sentences.english: It's got a melting point of 204 degrees Celsius.
The melt point of niclosamide is 233C.
Different base metal alloy has the different melting point and linear coefficient expansion.
sentences.chinese: 不同的基底合金具有不同的熔点及线膨胀系数。

sentences.english: The melting temperatures and heats of fusion decrease approximately linearly with the reciprocals of cluster radii.
sentences.chinese: 团簇的熔点和熔化焓与团簇半径的倒数呈线性关系。

sentences.english: The photos showed that, after some surges, the silver layer reached its melting point, causing it to liquefy.
sentences.chinese: 照片显示若干次浪涌后，银板达到熔点液化。

sentences.english: Not consist of cadmium, the melting point lower than 25B, bettered wetness and filling property.
sentences.chinese: 无镉熔点低于25B，提高了润湿性和填充性。

sentences.english: The flux has advantages of appropriate melting point , good fluidness and good conductivity .
sentences.chinese: 这种焊剂具有合适的熔点，良好的流动性及导电性。

sentences.english: It lowers the melting and freezing point of water.
sentences.chinese: 是因为食盐将水的熔点和冰点降低了。

sentences.english: It is insoluble in water . It should be avoided to storage at high-temperature.
sentences.chinese: 不溶于水，因本品熔点较低，要避免高温贮存。

sentences.english: These fats also contain appreciable amounts of fully saturated triacylglycerols and exhibit relatively high melting points.
sentences.chinese: 这些脂肪还含有大量饱和三酰基甘油，熔点较高。

sentences.english: Only when its melting-point temperature is reached does iron start to pass into a liquid.
sentences.chinese: 只有当熔点温度达到时，铁才开始变成液体。

sentences.english: The product was characterized by melt point and IR spectra analysis.
sentences.chinese: 经熔点测定和红外光谱分析，确证产品是苯酚。

sentences.english: Suited for brazing quench-steel and little, thin part with low melting point and good technics.
sentences.chinese: 熔点低，工艺优良，适用淬火钢和小薄件零件的焊接。

sentences.english: This paper describes the development trend of low melting point and high melting point type Lead-free solder paste.
sentences.chinese: 概述了低熔点和高熔点型无铅焊膏的开发动向。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
